name: Molemen Must Die!
description: Molemen Must Die is a game of huge bombs and revenge gone wrong, fighting for the honor of your temper-tantrum President. Deliver a bomb to the center of the Earth in this action arcade epic, inspired by your favorite B-grade action flicks. Get ready to fail in the name of Presidential pride!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: 1.5 GHz in your choice of flavour, Intel or AMD Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Can produce mad beats Additional Notes: Controller Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: 2 GHz in your choice of flavour, Intel or AMD Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia or AMD Graphics (Sorry Intel!) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Can produce the most mad beats Additional Notes: Controller Recommended
